data.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
data.text:
Publishers Electronic Arts, Inc. Developers Electronic Arts UK Ltd. Release date 2005 Genre Action Game rating

Game Description

Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire is an action-adventure video game based on the film Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire, which in turn is based on J. K. Rowling’s Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire, the fourth novel in the Harry Potter series. The game was released in 2005 to coincide with the release of the film of the same name, for Game Boy Advance, GameCube, Microsoft Windows, Nintendo DS, PlayStation 2, Xbox, and PlayStation Portable.

Download Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

We might have the game available for more than one platform. Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire is currently available on these platforms:

Windows (2005)

Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire_Win_Preinstalled_EN.zip (859.6MB)

Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire_Win_ISO_EN.zip (903.1MB)

How to play on Windows (Preinstalled)

Download and extract Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire_Win_Preinstalled_EN.zip

Launch game by double clicking gof_f.exe

Play the game

How to play on Windows (have to install)

Download and extract Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire_Win_ISO_EN.zip

Mount HPGF-Azzi777-CD1.iso and run the setup.

When the setup launches, they will ask for a CD key. Use the key found in “Serial Key.txt”

When they ask for the second disc, mount HPGF-Azzi777-CD2.iso and click OK.

When the installation is completed, copy-paste the files found inside the “NoCD” folder into the folder you installed the game in (by default, this is C:\Program Files (x86)\Electronic Arts\Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire). When prompted, select to replace the files in the destination.

Launch game by double clicking gof_f.exe

Play the game
